brat534: (if 2040 is too busy to fulfil your request) you can search for 'white collar season 2' at the top of the page; you'll find a 2.2 gig torrent. Quality will obviously not be of 2040's level, but size, I think, is in the range you're looking for.

2040: I'm not trying to link-bait (no links posted!) just thought would save you the trouble of replying. if I'm on the wrong side- I'm sorry; won't do it again (:

Thank you for this pack, especially FG, MP, TB, TK, and TS.
[+1]

@brat534: I made Season One pack of WC and during past summer uploaded all episodes at MU and made them available though MU.txt in many torrents. 

In six months only few episodes were downloaded - don't laugh - THREE (3) times only. On start of Season Two - I encoded and upped first two episodes, back then as separate torrents (well, Pack haters are wrong). Do you know how many downloads W.C 201 and 202 have? 27 and 24 respectively.

What followed was logical - I dropped White Collar because of lack of interest, not because show was bad - I don't like to feel stupid by doing unwanted things.
For no reason - more people discovered that show at second half of second season, asked for it - and I encoded and upped all episodes till season-end.

After that, I re-upped ALL encodes of season two I have once again, as were requested, as "plus" in my daily and weekly packs.

Now - they are all gone - due to HDD crash I have a month back.

Anyone who can log-in, can make and up  torrents too. I helped whenever someone wanted to make season packs of my encodes. Most of the times I can't do it myself,  from bandwidth and time limitations - and now, I have no surviving W.C episode to start with.

@Ataractic: It's fine.
